column5: Anyone know of anyone locally here (Guelph, Kitchener/Waterloo/Cambridge) that makes quality jigs and sell them in bulk?  I am looking specifically for 1/4-3/8-1/2, all types (Football, Casting and Brush Jigs).  I'd like to purchase like 30-50 of them, need to restock for the upcoming season!  Thanks!  In retail ones don't always have the colors I want.
Punisher Jigs, Lightning Series, and Perfect Jig come to mind.  They all can handtie with your favorite head and hook. I love the Owner deep throat hooks.
